title: DM Metal
description: DM Metal is a metal fabrication company's website offering metal processing services, metal structures, and metal fences. The site is optimized for mobile devices and provides an easy way to contact the company.
longDescription: DM Metal is a specialized company for metal structures and metal processing, offering its services for over 10 years.
The website was designed to provide potential clients with an easy overview of services and quick communication with the company.
Special attention was given to mobile optimization, as most clients search for services through mobile devices.
The site includes a project gallery, contact information, and an inquiry form that enables quick communication with clients.

title: NarediMaturo
description: NarediMaturo is a web application that helps high school students prepare for their final exams. Digitized past exam papers, interactive exercises, and personalized study plans help students achieve better results.
longDescription: NarediMaturo is a comprehensive platform for final exam preparation, combining digitized past exam papers, interactive exercises, and personalized study plans.
The application enables students to effectively prepare for their exams using the latest digital tools and learning approaches.
The platform also offers progress tracking, performance analytics, and AI-powered recommendations for improving results.
With Stripe payment integration, we provide access to premium content while keeping basic features free for all users.

title: Connected Load Carrier
description: Connected Load Carrier is a web application that enhances digital supply chains by providing real-time asset tracking, advanced data analysis, and operational efficiency for businesses.
longDescription: Connected Load Carrier is a comprehensive platform designed to revolutionize supply chain management by offering real-time asset tracking, advanced data analysis, and enhanced operational efficiency.
The application enables businesses to monitor their assets accurately, reduce losses, and optimize logistics processes.
The platform also offers sustainability through a circular economy, contributing to environmental responsibility.
With a focus on reliability and innovation, Connected Load Carrier provides solutions that adapt to the evolving landscape of connected logistics.

title: ŠUŠU Bubble Tea & Kofi
description: ŠUŠU is a modern bubble tea and coffee shop, offering a variety of high-quality bubble tea flavors, coffee, and desserts like cake pops and mochi. Located in Ljubljana, it focuses on delivering a unique beverage experience.
longDescription: ŠUŠU Bubble Tea & Kofi is a trendy café in Ljubljana that specializes in bubble tea, coffee, and unique desserts. The shop is known for its high-quality ingredients and customizable drinks.
The brand offers a diverse range of bubble tea flavors, from classic milk teas to fruit-based options, ensuring there's something for everyone.
Apart from beverages, ŠUŠU serves delicious cake pops and traditional mochi, making it a go-to spot for sweet lovers.
With an active presence on social media, ŠUŠU keeps its customers engaged through promotions, new flavors, and seasonal specials.

title: Shovels AI
description: Shovels.ai is a platform that provides access to comprehensive building permit and contractor data, enabling businesses to identify qualified contractors, understand their work history, and connect with decision-makers.
longDescription: Shovels.ai is a comprehensive platform designed to make building permit data easy to understand and use for market research, go-to-market strategies, and sales. The platform offers clean and useful building permit data that's easy to understand, eliminating the need for extensive data engineering.

The platform offers multiple interfaces to interact with building permit and contractor data, including a web application, API access, and direct database integrations with platforms like Snowflake, BigQuery, or Databricks.

Shovels.ai serves various industries, including construction technology, energy and climate, building material suppliers, and real estate, providing tailored solutions to meet specific industry needs.
